title: Angry Birds
description: The game series focuses on the eponymous flock of colorful angry birds who try to save their eggs from green-colored pigs.

title: Candy Crush
description: Master the legendary match 3 puzzle game from King and have a blast! With over a trillion matching levels played, Candy Crush Saga is the popular match 3 puzzle game!
